definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be heavy, weighty, burden-some, honoured (NH Pi. honour, and deriv., [[כּׂבֶד]] weight; Ph. n.pr.f. [[כבדת]] = honoured one, and in cpd. n.pr.; Eth. kabad: be heavy, etc.; As. kabâdu or kabâtu, grow or be heavy, Dl:HWB; cf. Ar. kabadun difficulty, distress; kabada III. struggle with difficulties, etc.; Zinj. [[כבדו]] honour, DHM:Sendsch. 58; Sab. [[כבודת]] gifts of honour, = Heb. [[נדבה]] freewill offering DHM:ZMG 1883, 341 f.—

be heavy, in weight, of misfortune, heavier than sand Job 6:3; of God's hand in punishment 1Sa 5:11, with [[אֶל]] 1Sa 5:6; [[עַל]] Ps 32:4; of man's hand in war Ju Jdg 1:35; [[יׇדִי כָּֽבְדָה עַל־אַנְחָתִי]] my hand is heavy upon my groaning Job 23:2 is explained by Targum Hrz Schlottm as hand smiting me; but read rather with LXX SyrVer Ew De Reu Di [[יׇדוֹ]] of God's hand; of pressure [[אַכְפִּי]] Job 33:7 (LXX [[כַּפִּי]]); = vehement, sore, of battle Ju Jdg 20:34; c. [[אֶל]] 1Sa 31:3 = [[עַל]] 1Ch 10:3; burdensome, grievous; [[וְלאׁ נִכְבַּד עָלֶיְ֑]] lest we be burdensome unto thee 2Sa 13:23; of work laid upon one, bondage, with [[עַל]] Ex 5:9 (JE) Ne 5:18; of sin conceived as a burden Ge 18:20 (J), iniquities Ps 38:5; transgressions, with [[עַל]] Is 24:20.
heavy, insensible, dull, of the eyes, so as to be unable to see Ge 48:10 (JE); of the ears Is 59:1; of the [[לֵב]], hard, insensible Ex 9:7 (J ; P and E's syn. is [[חָזַק]], q. v.)
be honoured (cf. baru/v) of a man Job 14:21 (opp. [[יחערו]]: cf. Hiph.
), of Tyre Ez Eze 27:25, of Yahweh Is 66:5.
pass.

definitions.body: be made heavy fr. abundance, [[מַעְיׇנוֹת נִכְבַּדֵּי־]] [[מָָיִם]] fountains abounding in water Pr 8:24.

definitions.title: b.

medial, get oneself glory (or honour), of God Is 26:15, Ez Eze 28:22, Eze 39:13, Hag 1:8; with [[בְּ]] in or by any one Ex 14:4, Ex 14:17, Ex 14:18 (P); [[עַל־פְּנֵי]] Le 10:3 (P).
